title: What's included?
titleparagraph:
Our prices start from Â£36 per month** and are fixed for the duration of the plan.
There are absolutely no additional costs or increases.

content.paragraph: A super efficient A-rated leading brand boiler, which is also Hydrogen Gas ready, so if supply changes in the future, you're ready.
We cover all annual service costs during your Warmly Plan, plus you can relax knowing we'll remind you each time your service is due.
Unlimited boiler repairs (including parts and labour) and if your boiler can't be fixed, we'll replace it free of charge.
Deal directly with trained, local Gas Safe registered experts you can trust. If you've got a problem, they're just a phone call away with no call-out charges to worry about.
The installation, repairs and all safety checks are covered for the entirety of the plan. There are no excess charges, no inflation increases and no call-out fees.
Certainty in an uncertain world - your monthly cost is fixed for the life of your plan, meaning there's no price increases.
